title.rendered: Alice in Wonderland: A Colouring Book for Stress Relief

content.rendered: Lewis Carroll was one of the most creative, imaginative minds of the 19th century. The book contains 70 ready-to-colour drawings of scenes inspired by Alice’s adventures in Wonderland, including your favourite characters – the Mad Hatter, the Queen of Hearts, the White Rabbit, the Cheshire Cat and many more.

excerpt.rendered: Lewis Carroll was one of the most creative, imaginative minds of the 19th century. The book contains 70 ready-to-colour drawings of scenes inspired by Alice’s adventures in Wonderland, including your favourite characters – the Mad Hatter, the Queen of Hearts, the White Rabbit, the Cheshire Cat and many more.
